column4: Although #Halloween celebrations will look somewhat different this year due to #coronavirus, there are still ways to safely have fun & enjoy some treats! As you plan your weekend, including any potential outings, be sure to review @CDCgov's health & safety guidance. ↓ https://t.co/RNTqRztNYU
RT @HouseAppropsGOP: Appropriations Leaders Highlight Provisions in Targeted Republican Coronavirus Relief Bill https://t.co/bV5JEwlYN6

I am proud that H.R. 14 would not only replenish resources & provide reinforcements for our frontline health workers, but it would improve national testing & contract tracing capabilities & importantly support eventual delivery of a #coronavirus vaccine & lifesaving treatments. https://t.co/RDsXGgypsw
This includes our brave police officers, firefighters & EMS personnel, who are first on the scene responding to car accidents, fires & urgent cases of tree limbs & debris falling through homes.

Before #coronavirus struck the world, America’s economy was booming & communities were thriving. We can find our way back to our prosperous not-so-distant past, & @HouseGOP's #CommitmentToAmerica provides a realistic path to get us there.

🇺🇸 Learn more: https://t.co/vgEb2lSgRT

ICYMI: I recently joined @CSIS for a virtual discussion about the ongoing U.S. response to the #coronavirus pandemic. 

📺 Watch at the link below ↓ https://t.co/GhzsgMuC1I

#WorldMentalHealthDay is a critical reminder to walk alongside your loved ones who are fighting silent battles. No one should face darkness alone.

If you are struggling with feelings of hopelessness or having suicidal thoughts, please call 1-800-273-TALK.
https://t.co/srZT7Z54No

As discussions continue between Speaker Pelosi & Secretary Mnuchin this week, I remain hopeful for a breakthrough & that a bipartisan deal can be reached on #coronavirus relief – one that both chambers of Congress can actually pass & @POTUS will sign. https://t.co/DWuVQr8aez
My prayers are with President Donald Trump and First Lady Melania Trump as they quarantine and recover after testing positive for COVID-19. I have every confidence that they will beat this virus.

If @SpeakerPelosi & @HouseDemocrats insist on crafting partisan bills & refuse to consult @HouseGOP, it shouldn't come as a surprise when that legislation goes nowhere in the Senate & never reaches @POTUS.  

My remarks on Democrats' latest stunt with #coronavirus relief ↓ https://t.co/iQMixk94dR

While #coronavirus has turned our lives upside down, @HouseGOP & @POTUS are committed to restoring our way of life & rebuilding our economy. A key component of our #CommitmentToAmerica is ensuring #smallbiz job creators survive these difficult times. 

https://t.co/exodIaSa7x

There was a lot to cover from this extraordinarily busy week in my Weekly Chat. Hope you'll take the time to hear my thoughts on recent House votes, the status of #coronavirus relief, @HouseGOP's #CommitmentToAmerica & so much more. https://t.co/Us9HSCkpeU

It's disappointing that @HouseGOP must resort to a discharge petition to pressure Speaker Pelosi to free up $ ALREADY provided & intended to aid #SmallBiz affected by the #coronavirus pandemic. 

More on our #FightForSmallBiz ↓
https://t.co/r1A33QJUxE

While the #coronavirus pandemic has greatly disrupted our lives & unapologetically dealt some of the worst hits to #smallbiz, @HouseGOP members are committed to working with @POTUS to restore our way of life & rebuild our economy. 

Learn more: https://t.co/vgEb2lSgRT

Thanks to #OperationWarpSpeed, the U.S. is closing in fast on a safe & effective vaccine to eliminate #COVID19. Every American should be proud that we have the talent, resources & logistical ability to scale such a task in record time!

More in my Weekly Chat ↓ https://t.co/yO3rZ4bqAz

Always proud to lend my voice to #RallyMedRes. As I said during this year's virtual event, the #coronavirus pandemic has shown it's more important than ever to prioritize $ for biomedical research at @NIH. @RallyForNIH 

Watch remarks from me & others: https://t.co/SCA0YKcBNK

Just talked with @NEWSRADIOKTOK's Lee Matthews about a variety of topics, including @HouseGOP's #CommitmentToAmerica unveiled this week, my pledge to stand with police & the status of #coronavirus relief negotiations.     

Listen to our conversation ↓ https://t.co/NutHXGlrhD

In the worldwide race for a cure & vaccine for #COVID19, the United States is rapidly covering ground & running lengths ahead of other countries. Why? Because of #OperationWarpSpeed initiated by @POTUS! 🇺🇸

More in my column: https://t.co/djyZydCygY https://t.co/jLZv3DO98r

RT @HouseGOP: The Trump Administration is leading an all-hands-on-deck mission to develop a safe COVID-19 vaccine.

With government funding set to expire soon & the still unfulfilled need for additional coronavirus relief, expect it to be an active September in Congress. 

My thoughts on what's ahead in my Weekly Chat ↓ https://t.co/Q6l94x3lLR

On #LaborDay, we celebrate our job creators & dynamic workforce that power our economy & will help rebuild it. While #coronavirus has paused business as usual, I'm encouraged by signs of recovery already underway as we race to find a vaccine!

Read more: https://t.co/Bwa4wqfN0s https://t.co/oWH9O2HiuJ

Proud to join @RepFrankLucas in asking @USDA to broaden the Coronavirus Food Assistance Program & ensure that ALL wheat farmers receive its benefits. 

Doing so will help farmers hurt by #COVID19 get back on their feet & ensure Americans have access to the food they need. https://t.co/UMJ4R8hijL

Although Speaker Pelosi continues to stall meaningful negotiation on more #coronavirus relief, this week I am encouraged to report that the U.S. is making rapid progress toward a vaccine, thanks to #OperationWarpSpeed initiated by @POTUS!

More in my Weekly Chat ↓ https://t.co/Lif7zEWYoB

While it's been an eventful week, it's been disappointing in terms of meaningful congressional news, due to Speaker Pelosi's unwillingness to sit down & seriously negotiate on a fifth bipartisan #coronavirus relief measure.   

My thoughts on the latest in my #WeeklyChat ↓ https://t.co/jkTLNzIgct
RT @TheOklahoman_: Cole bill aims to improve mental health care for Native American vets | @casteelpolitics #okpol https://t.co/k497KnoNFz

Like all veterans, Native Americans who have served in uniform deserve the best care & service the VA can provide, including culturally competent mental health care. Proud to join in introducing bipartisan legislation to address these unique needs. 
https://t.co/XYKAraESGF

Moreover, this positive report demonstrates the lasting impact of U.S. investment in global partnerships - like those undergone by @CDCgov & @USAID - that help build better health systems & fight disease around the world.

Encouraged to learn the African region was certified free of the wild poliovirus today! Notably, this milestone follows nearly 25 years of @Rotary's tireless advocacy & volunteer efforts to #EndPolio. https://t.co/d9PANDPiCw

Amid the multitude of hardships caused by the #coronavirus crisis, it's sad but true that bad actors are out there looking to scam vulnerable targets. 

Tips on how to protect yourself ↓

This week in Congress: The House considered a second FY 2021 funding package, leaders discussed a fifth coronavirus relief package & we all rightly paused to remember the life & legacy of our dear colleague, Congressman John Lewis.

Between votes on NDAA & the Great American Outdoors Act, starting consideration of FY19 funding bills & ongoing discussions related to a fifth #coronavirus supplemental, it's already been a very active week in Congress.
